title: Composition aux dominos
marks: Signature, Date, Edition and Stamp LRC, in the image: [47 / F. LEGER]; LRC, in brown
description: After an original painting by Leger; red, yellow, green, black and white, with grey-blue edges; biomorphic shapes and several black and white dominos at bottom
creditline: Gift of Sandra and Peter Butler
